mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.paren_idt AS "parenIdt", a.dept_name AS "deptName", a.dept_code AS "deptCode", a.dept_propertity AS "deptPropertity", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.create_date AS "createDate"
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM dept_dict WHERE del_flag = '0' and org_id=#{orgId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dept_dict( id, parent_id, dept_name, dept_code, dept_propertity, org_id, input_code, remarks, update_by, create_by, update_date, del_flag, create_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parentId}, #{deptName}, #{deptCode}, #{deptPropertity}, #{orgId} , #{inputCode}, #{remarks}, #{updateBy}, #{createBy}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{createDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE dept_dict SET parent_id = #{parentId}, dept_name = #{deptName}, dept_code = #{deptCode}, dept_propertity = #{deptPropertity}, org_id=#{orgId}, input_code=#{inputCode}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
